{"ops":[[0,["root",0],"x",["",0],0],[0,["q",1],"
",["root",0],1],[1,["q",2],["root",0],1],[6,["1",3],[[0,["1",3],"Untitled",["q",1],-1],[2,["1",11],["1",3],["q",1],{"e":"true"}]]],[2,["1",12],["q",1],["q",1],{"h":"1"}],[6,["!1",13],[[2,["!1",13],["1",3],["q",1],{"e":"true"}],[2,["!1",14],["q",1],["q",1],{}],[1,["!1",15],["1",3],8],[0,["!1",16],"Montana's Majesty
Vast skies stretch endlessly blue,
Over rolling plains and mountains true.
Nature's canvas, wild and free,
Montana's beauty, a sight to see.
Glacier peaks touch the clouds above,
While bison roam the lands they love.
Rivers carve through rocky terrain,
A wilderness that will always remain.
Big Sky Country, where dreams take flight,
Under starry heavens, day and night.
From Yellowstone to the Rockies grand,
Montana calls, a promised land.
Wildflowers paint meadows with hues,
As gentle breezes carry mountain views.
A rugged paradise, untamed and bold,
Montana's story, forever told.",["1",10],1],[2,["!1",620],["!1",33],["!1",33],{"h":"1"}]]]]}
